root: ^The seal billows away into nothing. The sword slides out easily from the stone now that there’s no seal to keep it secure.
^The crushed grail in the knight’s hands drops onto the ground as he glares at you.
^He’s weaker now, look at your EMF reader.
^You notice Archibald is right. The EMF reader that you clipped onto your belt is glowing yellow. He’s dropped a level.
^It seems the holy sword and the holy water covering the makeshift grail have done wonderfully to weaken him.
^His words seem to be directed at Archibald.
^For what you did to me, I will kill you...
^His Holiness will forgive me after I explain to him…
^After I kill you, I’ll bring back the grail.
